scripts.build-stream: cd ..\chrome-extension\ && npm install && npm run stream-dev && robocopy dist.win ..\win-client-app\resources\stream /E /COPY:DAT /R:0 /W:0 || exit 0
scripts.build-relay: cd relay && rsrc -ico app.ico && go build -ldflags="-s -w" .
scripts.build-all: npm run build-stream && npm run build-relay && npm run build && neu build --release
scripts.pack: npm run build-all && npm run zip
